definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Some are like myself, working as a teacher, reading and writing, content with a simple life.
sentences.chinese: 有的和我一样当教书先生，读读写写满足简朴的生活。

sentences.english: Grads get offers in grassroots-level schools teaching in Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 广东应届毕业生获得农村学校教书的就业机会。

sentences.english: They told that Professor Liu would have been teaching here for twenty years by this winter.
sentences.chinese: 他们说到今年冬天时刘教授在这里教书要满二十年了。

sentences.english: When there is a good school for every child, I may be ready.
sentences.chinese: 当每一个孩子都能上好学校时，我也许会回去教书。

sentences.english: Comprehensively implement the party’s education policy, teaching, education simultaneously Friday.
sentences.chinese: 全面贯彻执行党的教育方针，教书育人，五育并举。

sentences.english: I'm an elementary school teacher in Austin, Texas.
sentences.chinese: 我在德克萨斯州奥斯丁市一所小学教书。

sentences.english: In the guerrilla areas, Wang continued his teaching, devoting himself particularly to children in the primary schools.
sentences.chinese: 在游击区，老王仍旧教书，他特别重视小学教育。

sentences.english: Laura, then 62, was teaching at poverty-level wages.
sentences.chinese: 当时劳拉62岁，还在教书，收入微薄。

sentences.english: He worked as a teacher in Goteborg for many years.
sentences.chinese: 他在哥德堡教书很多年了。

sentences.english: There was great excitement the year I started lecturing in the philosophy department.
sentences.chinese: 刚开始在哲学系教书的那一年我非常激动。

sentences.english: Are you planning to stay here and teach students?
sentences.chinese: 你计划待在这里教书吗？

sentences.english: The teaching staff shoulders the responsibility of teaching and educating students.
sentences.chinese: 教职工肩负着教书育人的责任。

sentences.english: Surely, I gave lectures and tried to work hard for UIBE.
sentences.chinese: 我曾在这里努力工作，教书讲课。

sentences.english: I do not have an US teaching certificate. How can I teach in USA?
sentences.chinese: 我没有美国的教师资格证，我能在美国教书吗？

sentences.english: Not only did he teach school, but he wrote novels.
sentences.chinese: 他不但在学校里教书，而且还写小说。

sentences.english: The schooling essence is not only teaching knowledge but also educating people.
sentences.chinese: 学校教育的本质是既教书又育人。

definition: to read a book/to study/to attend school
to teach classes in addition to other duties/to hold several teaching jobs
to teach as substitute for absent teacher
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
to give classes/to work as a teacher
to go to school/to attend school
